name: Protoship Decode: HTML+Tailwind for Figma
description:
Tutorials coming soon! For any help write to us at hello@protoship.io


https://protoship.io/decode


Protoship Decode is an HTML editor for Figma. But without any of the manual design-to-code grunt work.


Instead, decode lets you insert elements from the design directly into the HTML you're writing. This speeds you up 10x.


Currently supports the Tailwind CSS utility framework.
